Name: Adhesion
Notes: Works similar to magentism but on all materials.  Instant on/off and can be used with only some parts of the body if desired.

Name: Agravated Damage
Notes: If all unarmed combat dice succeed, stage damage level by 1

Name: Aimed Shot*
Notes: reduce called shot modifer by 1 per level

Name: Aid Spell*
Notes: 1 die per level to support magician casting a spell in same Initiative Phase

Name: Animal Empathy*
Notes: 1 die per level for attempts to threaten, calm or frighten an animal

Name: Astral Perception
Notes: You have the ability to see and reach into the astral plane via astral perception.

Name: Attribute Boost(STR)*
Notes: Make a Magic Test against a target number equal to one half the base (unaugmented)rating of the attribute being boosted (round up) . . . When the boost runs out you must make a Drain Resistance Test.

Name: Attribute Boost(QIC)*
Notes: Make a Magic Test against a target number equal to one half the base (unaugmented) rating of the attribute being boosted (round up) . . . When the boost runs outyou must make a Drain Resistance Test.

Name: Attribute Boost(BOD)*
Notes: Make a Magic Test against a target number equal to one half the base (unaugmented) rating of the attribute being boosted (round up) . . . When the boost runs outyou must make a Drain Resistance Test.

Name: Blend In\Stand Out
Notes: One power can be used either way.  Use counts as sustaining a spell but is not evident in astral.

Name: Blind Fighting
Notes: Blind fighting reduces the visibility modifier for blind fire or full darkness to +4.

Name: Body Control*
Notes: Each level of body control provides 1 additional die for Resistance Tests against toxins and diseases.

Name: Combat Sense +1
Notes: Combat sense provides an instinctive sense about an area and any potential threats nearby. See table (SR3-169).

Name: Combat Sense +2
Notes: Combat sense provides an instinctive sense about an area and any potential threats nearby. See table (SR3-169).

Name: Combat Sense +3
Notes: Combat sense provides an instinctive sense about an area and any potential threats nearby. See table (SR3-169).

Name: Commanding Voice
Notes: Adept can speak a Command with three or less words. Opposed test between adepts Charisma and opponents Willpower. If the adept wins the opponent is either distracted or obeys the command (GM).

Name: Cool Resolve*
Notes: Protection against intimidation, manipulation, or fooling in social situations. +1 die per level against any of such rolls. No protection against magic or critter powers, but against other adepts powers.

Name: Counterstrike*
Notes: +1 die per level for counterattack tests in melee combat, either armed or unarmed.

Name: Deep Rooting
Notes: Same Effect as level 1 Rooting; Recoil penalties halved. Movement is limited

Name: Delay Damage 1
Notes: The obvious form of this power is handled as a normal attack, it just appears to do no damage at the time.

Name: Delay Damage 2
Notes: An adept with the silent form of this power merely needs to bump into, brush against, or otherwise touch the target unobtrusively.

Name: Distance Strike
Notes: Adept can "transmit"an unarmed attack over a short distance (range in meters equal to the adept's magic) and inflicts the adept's standard unarmed damage.

Name: Eidetic Sense Memory
Notes: The adept gains photo sight memory in addition to a increased memory involving all other senses.

Name: Elemental Strike
Notes: In addition with Killing Hands an adept can create a secondary elemental effect, which is chosen when power is purchased.

Name: Empathic Healing
Notes: Empathic Healing grants the adept the ability to heal others by transferring their damage onto himself.

Name: Empathic Reading*
Notes: The adept senses if someone is lying. Receive -1 on target number per level when talking to someone who lies.

Name: Empathic Sense
Notes: Empathic Sense grants a limited form of magical awareness that allows an adept to sensethe feelings of those he can see with his unaided vision.

Name: Enhanced Balance 1
Notes: Reduce target number by one for each level of this power when performing acts of balance or knockdowns.

Name: Enhanced Balance 2
Notes: Reduce target number by one for each level of this power when performing acts of balance or knockdowns.

Name: Enhanced Perception*
Notes: Each level provides an additional die for all Perception Tests SR3-231, including astral perception, if you have that power.

Name: Enthralling Performance
Notes: The adept enthralls an audience with a performance (chosen when power is purchased) such as singing or dancing.

Name: Facial Sculpt
Notes: The adpet can sculpt his face as desired for a number of hours equal to his Magic attribute

Name: Flexibility 1
Notes: This power reduces the target numbers for athletics (escape artist) by 1.

Name: Flexibility 2
Notes: This power reduces the target numbers for athletics (escape artist) by 2.

Name: Freefall*
Notes: For each level of freefall, an adept can fall a distance of 2 meters without suffering an injury or making a damage resistance . . .

Name: Gliding
Notes: The adept can run a distance of (Magic) meters on tangible surfaces such as water, tree limbs or thin ice. Attempts for running longer distances require break points.

Name: Great Leap*
Notes: Each level of greatleap adds a die for Jumping Tests and is also added to the characters Quickness for determining the maximum distance a character can jump.

Name: Imp Abl Artistic Skl*->
Notes: This power gives you additional dice for use with an artistic/ perfomance Knowledge Skill.

Name: Imp Abl B/R Skl*->
Notes: This power gives you additional dice for use with a specific B/R Skill.

Name: Imp Abl Combat Skl*->
Notes: This power gives you additional dice for use with a specific Active Skill.

Name: Imp Abl Phys Skl*->
Notes: This power gives you additional dice for use with a specific Active Skill.

Name: Imp Abl Social Skl*->
Notes: This power gives you additional dice for use with a specific Social Skill.

Name: Imp Abl Vehicle Skl*->
Notes: This power gives you additional dice for use with a specific Vehicle Skill.

Name: Imp. Phys. Attr.(BOD)*
Notes: With this power you can improve a physical attribute.  Each level of the power increases the attribute by 1.

Name: Imp. Phys. Attr.(BOD)>RACMOD*  1
Notes: With this power you can improve a physical attribute beyond the Racial Modified limit.  Each level of the power increases the attribute by 1.

Name: Imp. Physical Attr.(STR)*
Notes: With this power you can improve a physical attribute.  Each level of the power increases the attribute by 1.

Name: Imp. Phys. Attr.(STR)>RACMOD*  1
Notes: With this power you can improve a physical attribute beyond the Racial Modified limit.  Each level of the power increases the attribute by 1.

Name: Imp. Physical Attr.(QCK)*
Notes: With this power you can improve a physical attribute.  Each level of the power increases the attribute by 1.

Name: Imp. Phys. Attr.(QCK)>RACMOD*  1
Notes: With this power you can improve a physical attribute beyond the Racial Modified limit.  Each level of the power increases the attribute by 1.

Name: Imp. Reflexes Level 1
Notes: This power increases the speed at which you react, just like wired reflexes SR3-301.

Name: Imp. Reflexes Level 2
Notes: This power increases the speed at which you react, just like wired reflexes SR3-301.

Name: Imp. Reflexes Level 3
Notes: This power increases the speed at which you react, just like wired reflexes SR3-301.

Name: Imp. Sense: Low-Light Vision   1
Notes: This power provides low-light vision SR3-300.

Name: Imp. Sense: Thermo Vision
Notes: This power provides thermographic vision SR3-300.

Name: Imp. Sense: Flare Comp.
Notes: This power provides flare compensation SR3-300.

Name: Imp. Sense: Vision Mag 3
Notes: This power provides vision magnification 3 SR3-300.

Name: Imp. Sense: High Freq. Hearing 1
Notes: This power provides high frequency hearing SR3-299.

Name: Imp. Sense: Low Freq. Hearing  1
Notes: This power provides low frequency hearing SR3-299.

Name: Imp. Sense: Sound Dampening    1
Notes: This power providessound dampening, functioning like the cyberear Dampener SR3-299.

Name: Imp. Sense: Sound Filter 5
Notes: This power provides sound filtering, functioning like the cyberear Sound Filter SR3-299.

Name: Imp. Sense: Spatial Recognizer 1
Notes: This power provides the benefit of the cyberear Spatial Recognizer SR3-299.

Name: Imp. Sense: Enhanced Hearing   1
Notes: This power provides enhanced hearing SR3-299.

Name: Imp. Sense: Directional Sense  1
Notes: You know what direction you are facing, and whether you are above or below the localground level, with a successful Perception 4 test.

Name: Imp. Sense: Improved Scent
Notes: You can identify scents in the same way as a bloodhound.

Name: Imp. Sense: Improved Taste
Notes: You have highly acute taste and can identify ingredients and contamination in food anddrink.

Name: Inertia Strike
Notes: The adept strikes a target with a base Damage Level reduced by one but the target must resist a Knockdown as if the Damage Level was one level higher, even if no damage was taken.

Name: Iron Gut
Notes: An adept can eat anything, his body will digest anything without harm. The Power of ingested toxins is reduced by 2.

Name: Iron Lungs
Notes: With each level of this power an adept can hold his breath for another 45 seconds. Each level reduces fatigue tests by 2.

Name: Iron Will*
Notes: Each level provides an additional die when resisting any attempt to control or alter the adept's mind, including manipulation spells and critter powers.

Name: Kinesics 1
Notes: An adept with Kinesics has complete control over his body's nonverbal and subconscious communication.

Name: Killing Hands STR(Light)
Notes: This power uses magic to turn unarmed attacks into light physical damage.

Name: Killing Hands STR(Medium)
Notes: This power uses magic to turn unarmed attacks into medium physical damage.

Name: Killing Hands STR(Serious)
Notes: This power uses magic to turn unarmed attacks into serious physical damage.

Name: Killing Hands STR(Deadly)
Notes: This power uses magic to turn unarmed attacks into deadly physical damage.

Name: Kinesics Level 1
Notes: The adept has complete control over his non-verbal and subconscious communication.

Name: Kinesics Level 2
Notes: The adept has complete control over his non-verbal and subconscious communication.

Name: Kinesics Level 3
Notes: The adept has complete control over his non-verbal and subconscious communication.

Name: Linguistics
Notes: The adept can learn language skill at no Karma cost.

Name: Living Focus
Notes: Adept can sustain a spell cast at him.

Name: Magical Power(Path:Magician)*  1
Notes: MagicLevel=Total

Name: Magic Resistance*
Notes: You posses an inherent resistance to sorcery.  Add 1 die per level of this power toall you Spell Resistance Tests.

Name: Magic Sense
Notes: May sense magical energies and effects within a radius equal to the adepts Magic Attribute x 5 in meters. Use the detection spell table (p. 192, SR3) to determinethe target numbers.

Name: Mask
Notes: Can not be used to reproduce unnatural features, cyberware appears unaltered.  Roll [rating] dice against a TN, which depends on the changes.

Name: Melanin Control
Notes: The character can shift hair and skin colours within natural limits.

Name: Missile Mastery
Notes: Masy use as throwing weapons such normally harmless items such as pens, credsticks and IDcards become deadly weapons in the adepts hands . . .

Name: Missile Parry
Notes: You can catch slow-moving missile weapons such as arrows, thrown knives and shuriken out of the air.

Name: Motion Sense
Notes: The adept can sense any movement within Magic attribute meters, but not behind astral barriers.

Name: Multi-Tasking
Notes: The adept is able to concentrate on seperate actions at the same time and can gather information from multiple senses simultaneously.

Name: Mystic Armor*
Notes: This power magically toughens your skin to resist the effects of damage. Each level providesyou with 1 point of Impact Armor, cumulative with any worn Impact Armor.

Name: Nerve Strike
Notes: Nerve strike allows an adept to inflict damage that effects a targets nervous system . . .Every two net success reduces quickness by one. If targets quickness is reduced to 0, the target is paralyzed.

Name: Nimble Fingers
Notes: The adept can perform simple reflex and timing tricks (such as inserting a clip into a gun) more efficiently.

Name: Pain Relief
Notes: The adept is able to cure one level of stun damage by channeling his energies.

Name: Pain Resistance*
Notes: Pain resistance allows you to ignore the effects of injury.  It does not reduce actualdamage, only it's effects on you.

Name: Penetrating Strike Level 1
Notes: An adept can bypass a target's impact armor. Cannot be used with Distance Strike.

Name: Penetrating Strike Level 2
Notes: An adept can bypass a target's impact armor. Cannot be used with Distance Strike.

Name: Penetrating Strike Level 3
Notes: An adept can bypass a target's impact armor. Cannot be used with Distance Strike.

Name: Pheromone Control
Notes: Each level adds 1 die to Charisma and social skill rolls.

Name: Quick Draw
Notes: The quick draw power allows an adept to use the quick drawing rules (P. 107, SR3) to quickdraw weapons other than pistols.

Name: Quick Strike
Notes: This power allows the adept to act first in one initiative pass per combat turn.

Name: Resilience*
Notes: The adept can stabilize Deadly Wounds and can minimize effects of extreme wounds such as loosing limbs.

Name: Ricochet
Notes: Allows the adept the ability to bounce bullets off of hard surfaces.  Each such ricochet takes 2 from the power of the bullet and adds 2 to the target number of the shot.

Name: Rooting*
Notes: Each level adds 1die to all tests to resist being knocked down, thrown, levitated or otherwise moved against his will.

Name: Side Step*
Notes: The adept gains one additional Combat Pool die per level for Dodge and Full Dodge attempts.

Name: Sixth Sense*
Notes: Each level allows the adept to roll an additional die when making Reaction Tests forsurprise SR3-108

Name: Sprint*
Notes: The adept gains +1 quickness for determining running distance.

Name: Smashing Blow
Notes: Smashing blow allows an adept to focus magical energy into a devastating strike designed to smash through barriers.

Name: Spell Shroud*
Notes: For each level of the power, the adept adds 1 die to Spell Resistance Tests against detection spells only.

Name: Staredown
Notes: Opposed Will(4) test with opponent, for every 2 net successes the winner rolls, the loser hesitates 1 phase.  Tie results in deadlock; either both lose phase and start again or someone forfeits one to end.

Name: Suspended State
Notes: Roll Willpower vs target of 4 and see the Hibernate spell description SR3-194.

Name: Sustenance
Notes: The adept only needs to have 3 hours of sleep and one full meal per day.

Name: Temperature Tolerance*
Notes: For each level of temperature tolerance, the adept gains an extra die for resisting the effects and damage of exposure to extreme temperature.

Name: Thermal Chameleon
Notes: Heat radiated from the adepts body becomes similar to it's surroundings. TN for perception tests to find adept with thermal vision/sensors get +1 per level.

Name: Three Dimensional Memory
Notes: The adept can remember a scene in a three-dimensional way and mentally walk through his memory at a later time.

Name: Traceless Walk
Notes: An adept with the traceless walk power can move over soft or brittle surfaces such as snow, sand, or thin paper without leaving any visible traces or noise.

Name: True Sight*
Notes: Each level of this power gives the adept an additional die when making Resistance Tests against illusion spells and illusion-based critter powers.

Name: Virtuoso
Notes: +1 per level to Perfoamnce ratring when physically playing an instrument.

Name: Voice Alteration
Notes: Adept can roll INT(8) to make his voice reproduce any natural sound, -1 TN for each previous sucess with a given sound.  TN 14 to mimic a voice.

Name: Voice Control
Notes: The adept can mask her voice, imitate sounds in the range of metahuman vocalisation and even copy another persons' voice.

Name: Wall Running
Notes: The adept can run up to Magic attribute meters on walls or other vertical surfaces.
